column4: hello how i can add using /etc/fstab i want to add mount for /home because i want to use quota option how 's that i try /home /home default 0 0 => didn't work

I think you need the relatime and you would also want fsck on that partition, so 0 2 is correct
pastebin your /etc/fstab so we can take a look at it
error come like : mount: special device home does not exist
from a terminal type sudo fdisk -l (lower case L), do you see the home partition?

is this an Wubi install via Windows?

well I've never used quotas, but you can't mount a /home partition if it doesn't exsist
